titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (NEUROSENSORY QUESTION C) - Description

div.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (NEUROSENSORY QUESTION C) is the PERSON SCORE for question C of the Neurosensory section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment.
The question asks "Does this child have hearing impairment not correctable with aids?".
